allpizza.name: Vegan Veggie
allpizza.menu_description: Daiya vegan mozzarella, paired with fresh veggies

allpizza.name: Veggie Supreme
allpizza.menu_description: combination of various vegetables such as bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, olives, tomatoes

allpizza.name: Mediterranean Pizza
allpizza.menu_description: Topped with ingredients inspired by Mediterranean cuisine, such as sun-dried tomatoes, artichoke hearts, feta cheese, olives, and fresh herbs

allpizza.name: Spinach and Feta Pizza
allpizza.menu_description: combination of spinach leaves and crumbled feta cheese

allpizza.name: Mushroom and Truffle Oil Pizza
allpizza.menu_description: A flavorful combination of sautéed mushrooms, truffle oil, mozzarella cheese

allpizza.name: Vegetarian Hawaiian
allpizza.menu_description: offers a meat-free twist. It typically includes pineapple, cheese, and sometimes additional toppings like bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, or olives.

allpizza.name: Classic Pepperoni Pizza
allpizza.menu_description: topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and slices of pepperoni, a spicy Italian-American variety of salami

allpizza.name: Double Pepperoni Pizza
allpizza.menu_description: loaded with twice the amount of pepperoni

allpizza.name: Spicy Pepperoni Pizza
allpizza.menu_description: pepperoni that includes additional spices or hot peppers to add an extra kick of heat to the classic combination

allpizza.name: Pepperoni and Mushroom Pizza
allpizza.menu_description: combination of pepperoni and mushrooms, offering a blend of meaty and earthy flavors

allpizza.name: Pepperoni and Sausage Pizza
allpizza.menu_description: combines pepperoni with Italian sausage, providing a hearty and flavorful experience

allpizza.name: Pepperoni and Jalapeño Pizza
allpizza.menu_description: pepperoni with slices of jalapeño peppers, creating a balance of heat and savory flavors

allpizza.name: Classic Margherita
allpizza.menu_description: combination of tomato sauce, slices of fresh mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves

allpizza.name: Neapolitan Margherita
allpizza.menu_description: include San Marzano tomato sauce, buffalo mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, extra virgin olive oil, and a sprinkle of salt

allpizza.name: White Margherita
allpizza.menu_description: replaces the traditional tomato sauce with a white sauce or olive oil base. It is topped with fresh mozzarella cheese, garlic, ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, and fresh basil

allpizza.name: Bufalina Margherita
allpizza.menu_description: buffalo mozzarella cheese,it is complemented by the usual tomato sauce, fresh basil, and olive oil

allpizza.name: Margherita al Pesto
allpizza.menu_description: pesto sauce made from basil, pine nuts, Parmesan cheese, garlic, and olive oil

allpizza.name: Margherita Four Cheese
allpizza.menu_description: combines the classic Margherita pizza with a luxurious cheese blend. It includes a base of tomato sauce, fresh basil leaves, and a combination of four cheeses such as mozzarella, Parmesan, fontina, and Gorgonzola.

allpizza.name: Classic Hawaiian
allpizza.menu_description: a base of tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese, topped with ham and pineapple chunks.The combination of sweet pineapple and savory ham creates a unique and contrasting flavor profile

allpizza.name: Teriyaki Chicken Hawaiian
allpizza.menu_description: combines the Hawaiian pizza concept with the addition of teriyaki chicken. It includes grilled or shredded chicken marinated in teriyaki sauce, along with the traditional toppings of pineapple, ham, tomato sauce, and mozzarella cheese.

allpizza.name: BBQ Hawaiian
allpizza.menu_description: combines the flavors of Hawaiian pizza with barbecue sauce. It features a base of barbecue sauce instead of tomato sauce, topped with mozzarella cheese, ham, pineapple, and ingredients such as red onions or bacon.

allpizza.name: Spicy Hawaiian
allpizza.menu_description: The spicy Hawaiian pizza adds a kick of heat to the traditional combination. It includes the usual ingredients of ham, pineapple, tomato sauce, and mozzarella cheese, but with the addition of spicy elements such as jalapeños or red pepper flakes.

allpizza.name: Vegetarian Hawaiian
allpizza.menu_description: offers a meat-free twist. It typically includes pineapple, cheese, and sometimes additional toppings like bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, or olives.

allpizza.name: Classic BBQ Chicken
allpizza.menu_description: The classic BBQ chicken pizza features a base of tangy barbecue sauce instead of tomato sauce, topped with cooked chicken pieces, mozzarella cheese, red onions, and additional ingredients like cilantro or bell peppers.

allpizza.name: Spicy BBQ Chicken
allpizza.menu_description: The spicy BBQ chicken pizza adds an extra kick to the classic version by incorporating spicy elements

allpizza.name: BBQ Hawaiian
allpizza.menu_description: combines the flavors of Hawaiian pizza with barbecue sauce. It features a base of barbecue sauce instead of tomato sauce, topped with mozzarella cheese, ham, pineapple, and ingredients such as red onions or bacon.

allpizza.name: Ranch BBQ Chicken
allpizza.menu_description: it incorporates ranch dressing along with the barbecue sauce, giving it a creamy and tangy element. It includes cooked chicken, barbecue sauce, ranch dressing, mozzarella cheese, and additional toppings like bacon or red onions.

allpizza.name: Classic Four Cheese
allpizza.menu_description: mouthwatering combination of four different types of cheeses. It typically includes a blend of mozzarella, romano, Parmesan, and oregano cheese.

allpizza.name: Margherita Four Cheese
allpizza.menu_description: combines the classic Margherita pizza with a luxurious cheese blend. It includes a base of tomato sauce, fresh basil leaves, a combination of four cheeses such as mozzarella, Parmesan, fontina, and Gorgonzola.

allpizza.name: Spinach and Four Cheese
allpizza.menu_description: combines the creaminess of four cheeses with the freshness of spinach. It typically includes a blend of mozzarella, ricotta, Parmesan, and feta cheese, along with sautéed or fresh spinach leaves.
